Articles.Content: Nearing 550!
6 mins in england!
COme on!!!
Forget school, I'M ON THE HYPETRAIN!!!!!
Got in on this before 250 holy crap.
Go to 550!

> 
> forget coal! Lets use plutonium!

screw that! Use antimatter!
The Steam Store page is now showing the 1.0 stuff! No more "Beta than Ever".

We've gone trans-plaid again.

Happy landings!
We have averaged about 2 pages a minute for the past 2 hours...

> 
> need moar hype coal were slowing down to a crawl

No, the hype dilatation is real. The servers are actually about two THOUSAND pages behind.. the hype will continue long after we hit the hype barrier and are squished into nothing, like some ghost transmission..

> 
> Got in on this before 250 holy crap.

Yeah, and that was just this morning.
Cmon 555 pages before release!!
Hype! Oh my gosh, this is EPIC!
We can do this 550!

Choo choo

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T16:56:09Z" title="04/27/2015 04:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**
  
Language, please.

Were going fast, Carl!

FAAAAAAAST!

![k-bigpic.gif](http://img.gawkerassets.com/img/18uywu5hvny7bgif/k-bigpic.gif)
MOAR pages!
wait, they said 1800hours UTC, didn't they?
Hype to 550!
550 before release!!
Wait, someone's been keeping stats on this thread? That's not hyped enough! MOAR HYPE, MOAR!

> 
> screw that! Use antimatter!

Let's use Nano-Fiber! It burns for a LONG time and is VERY efficient for speed!
I wonder if we will break 9000 posts before the release.
This train is going farther than I'd ever imagine!
